name: Fizik R3 Aria Cycling Shoes - Unisex
description: A premium road shoe that gets trickle-down tech from Fizik's WorldTour-level models. Microfibre upper is durable yet flexible, and perforated for extra breathability. The closure system is easy to control and fast to adjust, and it allows you to find a secure fit that's still comfortable. The carbon fibre sole hits the pinnacle of power transfer and aerodynamics.1.2mm supple Microtex synthetic leather upper is laser-perforated for breathability.Doubled Boa© IP-1 closure system is easy to adjust on the fly.Unidirectional carbon outsole transfers every precious watt to your pedals.Removable heel stud improves walking stability when off the bike.
